attributes.action: Give Blizzard, the creators of World of Warcraft, an asskicking for their craptacular customer service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't need to tell you what this is about. Read their own forums! Lag, unplayable servers, accounts suspended and no communication received, little to no feedback when problems occur. And all the time they are STILL TAKING OUR MONEY! This HAS to stop! Since online games are very much a grey area when it comes to consumer rights, a precedent MUST BE SET. These companies must NOT be  allowed to take liberties with the paying consumer and something MUST be done.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
